issues.description: Potential null reference exception: this.node.className is set before checking if this.node exists for React 16 environments
Memory leak: setTimeout callback references this.removePortal which holds a reference to the component instance after unmounting
No null check on parent before calling parent.removeChild(this.node), could cause error if parentSelector returns null
ownerHandlesClose() returns the onRequestClose function itself, not a boolean indicating if it exists
Variable 'target' used before declaration, causing potential reference error
Incorrect string comparison using != instead of !== for Safari detection
No null check before calling toFocus.focus(), could cause error if element was removed from DOM
No null check before setting aria-hidden attribute, could cause error if element doesn't exist
